TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed ThreadStart extends System.MulticastDelegate
type ThreadStart = delegate of unit -> unit

summary.span: 代表在 上執行的方法。

span.span: Represents the method that executes on a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 建立 managed 的執行緒時，有的執行緒執行的方法由委派或委派傳遞給建構函式。When a managed thread is created, the method that executes on the thread is represented by a delegate or a delegate that is passed to the constructor. 執行緒不會開始執行之前方法呼叫。The thread does not begin executing until the method is called. 所表示之方法的第一行中開始執行或委派。Execution begins at the first line of the method represented by the or delegate. > [!NOTE] > Visual Basic 和 C# 使用者可以省略或委派建構函式建立執行緒時。Visual Basic and C# users can omit the or delegate constructor when creating a thread. 在 Visual Basic 使用`AddressOf`運算子傳遞自己的方法時建構函式，例如`Dim t As New Thread(AddressOf ThreadProc)`。In Visual Basic, use the `AddressOf` operator when passing your method to the constructor; for example, `Dim t As New Thread(AddressOf ThreadProc)`. 在 C# 中，只需要指定執行緒的程序的名稱。In C#, simply specify the name of the thread procedure. 編譯器會選擇正確的委派建構函式。The compiler selects the correct delegate constructor. [C++][C++] > [!NOTE] > 在.NET framework 2.0 版建立委派 for c + + 中的靜態方法必須只有一個參數： 回呼方法，類別名稱所限定的位址。In version 2.0 of the .NET Framework, creating a delegate for a static method in C++ requires only one parameter: the address of the callback method, qualified by the class name. 在舊版中兩個參數是必要時建立靜態方法的委派： 零 (null) 和方法位址。In earlier versions two parameters were required when creating a delegate for a static method: zero (null) and the method address. 所有版本的執行個體方法，都需要兩個參數： 執行個體變數和方法位址。For an instance method, all versions require two parameters: the instance variable and the method address. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例顯示建立和使用的語法委派執行個體方法與使用靜態方法。The following code example shows the syntax for creating and using a delegate with an instance method and with a static method. 另一個簡單的範例，示範如何建立委派，請參閱方法多載。For another simple example that demonstrates how to create a delegate, see the method overload. 如需執行緒建立的詳細資訊，請參閱[建立執行緒和開始時間傳遞資料](~/docs/standard/threading/creating-threads-and-passing-data-at-start-time.md)。For more information about thread creation, see [Creating Threads and Passing Data at Start Time](~/docs/standard/threading/creating-threads-and-passing-data-at-start-time.md). [!code-cpp[System.Threading.ThreadStart2#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ThreadStart2/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Threading.ThreadStart2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ThreadStart2/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.ThreadStart2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ThreadStart2/VB/source.vb#1)]
